testCase.requirementText: File reference to administrative metadata mets/fileSec/fileGrp/file/@ADMID If administrative metadata has been provided for the file this attribute refers to the fileâ€™s administrative metadata by ID
testCase.description: This attribute has the cardinality of 0..1 and moscow-level MAY which is also the case in METS.xsd. There could be a test to see how many files have metadata file IDs, but this is at a nice-to-have-level and not really a requirement so all in all there are no rules connected with this testcase
